titleStmt.title: Londons metamorphosis: or, A dialogue between London & Amsterdam. Discoursing compendiously of the change of government, alteration of manners, and the escapes of sectaries. Amsterdam. In me both Jewes and Gentiles licens'd be, for to adore a severall deitie. London. Coblers preach here, as 'twere in Amsterdam, scorning, nè sutor ultra crepidam.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
